items.question: Are there any upfront charges for hiring from CloudareX?
items.answer: No, there are no upfront charges. You can read more about this on the Terms and Conditions policy.

items.question: Is the placement fee 9.5% of the base pay or the CTC?
items.answer: The placement fee is 9.5% of the candidateâ€™s Cost to Company (CTC) for any role hired through the CloudareX Talent platform. However, the placement fee is free until for Limited time.

items.question: What happens when I post the job role during the free period but hire the candidate later?
items.answer: If the job is posted during the free period, the placement fee remains waived regardless of when the hire occurs.

items.question: If a candidate who is a member of CloudareX applies directly to the job, does the company still have to pay the placement fee?
items.answer: Yes, if the candidate is hired through CloudareX, the placement fee applies unless waived by offer.

items.question: Is there a refund or replacement policy if the candidate resigns or is terminated from the company?
items.answer: Refunds/replacements are subject to the terms listed in the placement agreement.

items.question: Can a company modify a job role after it has been posted during the free period and hire for a different role once the free period ends?
items.answer: Modifications are allowed, but only hires made during the free period will be free of placement fee.

items.question: Have more questions?
items.answer: Please contact our support team for personalized assistance.
